paper_title: Chamber decomposition for K-semistable domains and VGIT
abstract: In this paper, we explore the relationship between the chamber decomposition for K-semistable domains and VGIT. We also study the relationship between the K-moduli generically parametrizing K-semistable Fano complete intersections of the form $S_{d_1}\cap...\cap S_{d_k}$ and the K-moduli generically parametrizing K-semistable log Fano pairs of the form $(\mathbb{P}^n, \sum_{j=1}^kx_jS_{d_j})$, where $x_j\in (0,1)\cap \mathbb{Q}$ and $S_{d_j}\subset \mathbb{P}^n$ is a hypersurface of degree $d_j$ for each $1\leq j\leq k$.
publication_venue: 15 pages, v2, proof of 5.1 simplified, more details added to 5.4. Comments welcome
